participant_1.name: Alex Harper
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, but sometimes feels overwhelmed by responsibilities.
participant_1.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and loves animals, enjoys relaxing activities but tends to avoid commitments.
participant_2.background: I love to cuddle up with my pug on rainy days. I have three dogs. I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future. I read my favorite comic books to take my mind off of things. I hate to drive.

content.text: Hi, I'm a barista during the week.
Nice to meet you, how's the barista life treating you?
It's fun, but I do wish I had more time to create my own artwork.
What kind of artwork do you create?
I'm a photographer and I also write music.
That's awesome, I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument, but I'm too afraid to commit to the time.
It's really fun! I play the ukulele and piano.
I love the ukulele! Do you have any pictures of your photography?
I do, I have a whole Instagram account dedicated to it.
Sweet! I'll check out your account too.
